meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intensional.
meanings.sent1: The intensionalities of the painting captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She studied the intensionalities of the concept to understand it better.
meanings.sent3: The intensionalities of the situation made her laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His intensionalities shone brightly in the dark room of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The intensionalities of the melody resonated deeply within her.

meanings.definition: The sum of all the attributes possessed by a given object.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the intensionalities of the car helped him fix it.
meanings.sent2: The intensionalities of the tree included its height, age, and color.
meanings.sent3: The intensionalities of the cake made it irresistible to everyone.
meanings.sent4: His intensionalities were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The intensionalities of the diamond sparkled in the sunlight.
